accounts.name: buyer_player_account
docs: The buyer's Player PDA (where the cNFT will be transferred)

accounts.name: seller_cobx_account
docs: Seller's cOBX token account (to receive payment)

accounts.name: leaf_owner
docs: Owner of the new player cNFT (PlayerAccount PDA for Web2 players)

accounts.name: player_account
docs: The seller's Player PDA (must own the cNFT being listed)

accounts.name: player_wallet
docs: Player's wallet to receive the cNFT

accounts.name: authority
docs: Player authority (must have connected wallet to withdraw)

errors.name: PlayerDoesNotOwnItem
errors.msg: Player does not own this item

errors.name: MissingTokenAccounts
errors.msg: Missing required token accounts for wallet payment

fields.name: seller
docs: The wallet of the player who listed the item

fields.name: seller_pda
docs: The seller's Player PDA where the cNFT is stored

fields.name: asset_id
docs: The asset ID of the cNFT being sold (Metaplex Bubblegum compressed NFT)

fields.name: tree_id
docs: The merkle tree containing the cNFT

fields.name: price
docs: The asking price in OBX tokens

fields.name: created_at
docs: Timestamp when the listing was created

fields.name: rarity
docs: Rarity of the item (for filtering and display)

fields.name: is_active
docs: Whether this listing is still active

fields.name: admin
docs: Admin account that can update settings
